nodes.text: Our crew has just retrieved the MechWarrior recovered from the Mad Cat's ejection pod. They are setting up a video feed so that we can talk to Laura Murray in her holding cell.
Maybe being brought back to the Hysteria has refreshed her memory about the last time we met, since she's made no mention to it so far. She'll probably be as nasty as ever.
The video connection has been established. Punching image to main screen.
[Holding Cell 1]
Who are you?

I am Laura Murray, Captain of the Satan's Kittens, the Scourge of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLadyDeath],Lady Death]] and her right hand on the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCouncilOfDamned],Council Of Damned]] of Tortuga City.

You are not! I saw her personally when the Kittens captured the ComStar compound at The Twins. 

You are not Laura Murray!

Did you actually see my face? Maybe it was too dark? Or maybe I just wasn't there? Or maybe that woman wasn't the real Laura Murray? Maybe I'm not her either?

After all, the universe is full of possibilites...
Your face reminds me of someone else... wait, you look like Natasha Kerensky, the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBlackWidow],Black Widow]]!

Monkeys can braid my hair! 

Darius is right, our prisoner does look like Captain Kerensky of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreWolfsDragoons],Wolf's Dragoons]]!
Me, Natasha Kerensky? Is that so? Raised from pirate to elite warrior? Hmmm, I might take that as a compliment tovarisch.
Who are you? If you are Natasha Kerensky, why are you assuming the identity of a known pirate leader that we've met before in the past?

Rethorical... questions! Who am I? Who are you? Say, you wouldn't happen to have some vodka hidden on this DropShip, would you?

After all, alcohol works great on loosing my tongue. Would you like that, pretty boy, getting some answers?

branches.responseText: We can skip the booze and I'll order Mr. Darius to try other interrogation methods instead.

nodes.text: Not fun... maybe I'm all of them, Commander. Laura Murray, Natasha Kerensky, and the cat who walks through walls. After all, the best place to hide is always in plain sight. If I am one of them, I cannot be the others. Da?

Commander, there's no point in trying to find out more about her. Whomever this person really is, she's never going to tell us. 

I know her kind, she's simply toying with us.

Score a point for the sharp mercenary commander. Oh no, she's the cheeky hotshot pilot isn't she? 

My bad... I didn't got all of your names. How about a smoke? I may have information about location of lost pirate treasure to trade for my freedom. After smoke, of course.
So what does this mumbo jumbo word dancing tell us? Is she the Black Widow or not? Also, I always imagined Natasha Kerensky to be blonde or brunette, definitely not red headed!

The Black Widow is known to change her appearance. At the same time, there's a lot of copy cats wanting to look like her. So she can both be Natasha Kerensky and not be her at the same time. 

It's interesting, there's a paradox in physics...

Me!? Accusing me of copying someone else's style!? In the streets of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreTortugaCity],Tortuga City]] that comment might get your throat slashed. With a razor made of plastic to make it last as long and painful as possible!

I do not see your point but I don't want an explanation that involves any sort of weird physics theories. I just fix things around here, no need to know how they actually work. 

So is she Laura Murray, the Black Widow, both, or neither? All possibilities sound legitimate at this point.

Discussion... theories... leave that to the scientists. Poor pirate is simply trying to make a living on this corner of the Universe, da? But everyone sentenced to death is entitled to a last smoke, at least... and I could tell you stories about all the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLosTech],LosTech]] you could ever imagine... just waiting for someone like you to recover it...

Be silent or cooperate with us by revealing who you truly are instead of this pointless innuendo and blatant lies!

Otherwise this transmission will end and you'll be left alone in the brig while we decide what to do with you!

Tvo yoo mat! I'm guessing one of the Marik boys send you as revenge for the death of their little uncle or cousin [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAntonMarik],Anton]]? Or they didn't bother to give you that information? Third-rate mercenaries you are indeed...
Wait, how do you know the ATC contract was assumed by the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMarikCommonwealth],Marik Commonwealth]]?

Darius, you're the worst interrogator ever! You've simply confirmed what she already suspected. 

You're not supposed to give information to the prisoner, it goes the other way around!

Not that hard to come to the conclusion. [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAlphardTradingCompany],ATC]] tries and tries and tries, all fails. Someone new is hired, someone who says has faced me before, someone gets lucky. 

Someone could have gotten paid more if someone knew real identity of me, perhaps, if Marik employer didn't kept it from someone! Not honest bargain, I say. Mine much better, pirate's honor.

Now you're trying to play that 'I am Natasha Kerensky' story and see if we're listening to that record spinning. 

If not, you'll play another fabrication just to get out of the noose. Pirates are all the same, no matter where you are in the universe.

I killed Anton Marik during the Marik Civil War! This mission of yours is unfinished business, I doubt the Janos was behind it since I removed a thorn from his side but someone on his family wants revenge for Anton. 

That's what this is all about Commander. Fuck your justice!

branches.responseText: So you're admitting not to be Laura Murray and this is all a revenge killing?

nodes.text:
If I'm not Laura Murray, then you failed in your contract because I'm not the leader of the Satan's Kittens. That's a dilemma. 

But if I'm Natasha Kerensky, then I'll always be killed when you give me to Marik, regardless if I'm impersonating a pirate captain.

This is getting tedious... give her an cigarette, and when she's done smoking let's just airlock her into space, like 'Laura Murray' did with all those pirates and ComStar personnel at [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreTheTwins],The Twins]].

Let the vacuum decide who this woman really is before she is forgotten in oblivion.

Slovach shut up! Your commander has already figured that you don't have to give me to Marik since the Mad Cat was destroyed and I'm supposed to be dead. After all, a live prisoner can be more valuable than a dead criminal. Especially if it's me!

branches.responseText: If you're Natasha Kerensky, then Wolf's Dragoons would confirm your identity.

nodes.text:
Maybe yes. Maybe [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJamieWolf],Jamie Wolf]] has his hands quite full right now. Maybe he might not want to be known that the real Natasha Kerensky is away. 

HPG traffic is so unreliable nowadays, transmitters are getting blown, Jamie could be anywhere, reply could take long to arrive. That's another dilemma.

branches.responseText: If you're Laura Murray, Lord Singh has an interest on you. But if you are Natasha Kerensky, then Marik will also have an interest, even if we're not getting paid extra.

nodes.text:
Those who break faith with the unity shall go down into darkness, Commander. Right now I'm both until you decide who I am, either by releasing me or revealing my survival to your employers. 

And if you decide to liberate me, remember that you'll be rewarded whether I'm Laura Murray or the Black Widow.

branches.responseText: <color=#85DBF6FF>[Story Decision: Bring Laura Murray to justice.]</color>
<color=#85DBF6FF>[Story Decision: Release the Satan's Kittens captain.]</color>
<color=#85DBF6FF>[Story Decision: Give Natasha Kerensky to House Marik.]</color>

nodes.text:
Disappointing, I guess. Not just the whole affair but especially all of you. 

I'll see you all at the end of the universe - here might be dragons.
A wise decision. Now you idiots just release me from this DropShip immediately, before Marik realizes that I'm still alive!

You have sentenced me to death. Wolf's Dragoons will avenge me!

I don't suppose I could interest you in the revelation of the location of my secret BattleMech treasure in exchange for my release?

Professional courtesy is always well appreciated among top-rated mercenaries, Commander.

Now get me out of this fucking brig.
